prompts.text: If two trains are traveling towards each other at 60 km/h and 80 km/h, how long until they meet if they start 280 km apart?
Write a Python function that reverses a string.
You have 3 liters and 5 liters jugs. How can you measure exactly 4 liters of water?
Return a JSON object describing a user with nested address (street, city, zip) and job (title, company).
Write a short story about a robot learning empathy.
